This page was automatically copied from [[HYH Meeting Template]] by [[User:Phong]]. If you would like to change the structure of how future meetings perform, please make any modifications to [[HYH Meeting Template]]. If you would like to propose something at the next meeting, bring it up on the mailing list with "PROPOSAL:" in the subject line and Phong will add it to the next meeting's agenda.

= Agenda =

* '''Note Taker:''' Paul Hickey
* '''Moderator:''' Paul Hickey
* '''Number of Members Present:''' 14

== Proposals ==

=== All proposals from previous meeting ===

=== [https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!topicsearchin/heatsynclabs/subject:proposal$20AND$20after:2012$2F11$2F08$20AND$20before:2012$2F12$2F07/heatsynclabs/Br4bfvgcsOE] Create guest sign-in book===

* Proposal by '''Paul Hickey'''
*9 For/1 Against - '''PASSED'''

=== [https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!topicsearchin/heatsynclabs/subject:proposal$20AND$20after:2012$2F11$2F08$20AND$20before:2012$2F12$2F07/heatsynclabs/Ld4p6T4WwAI] Define safety incident reporting===
*Proposal by '''Michael Mathers'''
*0 For/4 Against - '''FAILED'''

=== [https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!topicsearchin/heatsynclabs/subject:proposal$20AND$20after:2012$2F11$2F08$20AND$20before:2012$2F12$2F07/heatsynclabs/fXsfkVEGN6Q] Drink system moves to being a complete honors system===

*Proposal by '''Chad Stearns'''
*11 For/1 Against - '''PASSED'''

=== [https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!topicsearchin/heatsynclabs/subject:proposal$20AND$20after:2012$2F11$2F08$20AND$20before:2012$2F12$2F07/heatsynclabs/B_NLQtqzmPg] Card access for Mark 'Trunk' Kirschenbaum ===

*Proposal by '''Jacob Rosenthal'''
*15 For/0 Against - '''PASSED'''

=== [https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!topicsearchin/heatsynclabs/subject:proposal$20AND$20after:2012$2F11$2F08$20AND$20before:2012$2F12$2F07/heatsynclabs/Xeo0lk5Imgg] Purchase Craftsman miter saw to replace RAS ===

*Proposal by '''Ben Humphereys'''
*'''WITHDRAWN'''

=== [https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!topicsearchin/heatsynclabs/subject:proposal$20AND$20after:2012$2F11$2F08$20AND$20before:2012$2F12$2F07/heatsynclabs/lY-M_Rl9fOE] Only people with card access can vote on granting card access===

*Proposal by '''Chad Stearns'''
*9 For/5 Against - '''PASSED'''

=== [https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!topicsearchin/heatsynclabs/subject:proposal$20AND$20after:2012$2F11$2F08$20AND$20before:2012$2F12$2F07/heatsynclabs/ii3Vbz6TUxE] Officially declare our adherence to the Prime Directive ===

*Proposal by Ryan McDermott
*'''WITHDRAWN'''

=== [https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!topicsearchin/heatsynclabs/1500/heatsynclabs/HZSCjCSl5Ew] Grant 1500 in matching funds for the wood shop buildout ===

*Proposal by '''Brian Aday'''
*4 For/7 Against - '''FAILED'''
